TXT_Talk_Romaria_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0110_01.Text: *: Ciao e benvenuto! Hello and welcome to Romaria, friend!

TXT_Talk_Romaria_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0110_02.Text: *: Majesty! It is too dangerous for you to leave the town!
*: Majesty! It is too dangerous for you to leave the town!

TXT_Talk_Romaria_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0210_01.Text: *: Ciao e benvenuto! Hello and welcome to Romaria, friend!

TXT_Talk_Romaria_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0210_02.Text: *: For reasons of security, we must ask that you remain within the town gates!
*: For reasons of security, we must ask that you remain within the town gates!

TXT_Talk_Romaria_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0310_01.Text: *: It is no more than a rumour, but...the people, they speak of a great hero, from a place called Aliahan.
*: They say this hero will save us all from the evil Archfiend. Can it be true?
*: It is no more than a rumour, but...
*: The people, they say that the great hero of Aliahan, he came to our country, and became our king!
*: It is no more than a rumour, but...
*: The people, they say that the great hero of Aliahan, she came to our country, and became our queen!

TXT_Talk_Romaria_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0310_02.Text: *: Cribbio! Goodness! Uhh, ciao<--->I-I mean, salve, Your Majesty! It is an onore!
*: Ah, by the way, Majesty...has the hero still not come from Aliahan to save us? This is strange, no?
*: Cribbio! Goodness! Uhh, ciao<--->I-I mean, salve, Your Majesty! It is an onore!
*: Ah, by the way, Majesty...has the hero still not come from Aliahan to save us? This is strange, no?

TXT_Talk_Romaria_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0410_01.Text: *: You are a stranger to our land, sì? Bene, then I will teach you something of great use.
*: The king of our country<--->il Re<--->he is a very, how you say...fanciful man. If he have a whim, he follow it. Be careful of this.
*: You have abdicated your throne? Cazzarola... You are full of surprises...
*: You have abdicated your throne? Cazzarola... You are full of surprises...

TXT_Talk_Romaria_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0410_02.Text: *: M-Majesty... Che diavolo fai? What are you doing speaking with the likes of my humble self?
*: Ah, but since you are here, let me tell you something that may be of use...
*: If you ever should wish for a cloak of evasion, look no further than the village of Norvik. Prego!
*: M-Majesty... Che diavolo fai? What are you doing speaking with the likes of my humble self?
*: Ah, but since you are here, let me tell you something that may be of use...
*: If you ever should wish for a cloak of evasion, look no further than the village of Norvik.
*: Though I would not wish for you to conceal your form, so easy upon the eye as it is! Ehehehe!

TXT_Talk_Romaria_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0610_01.Text: *: Oh, you're from Aliahan, right? I knew as soon as I saw your clothes. They're so...plain.
*: Oh, you're from Aliahan, right? I knew as soon as I saw your clothes. They're so...plain.
*: Oh, you're from Aliahan, right? I knew as soon as I saw your clothes. They're so...plain.
*: Oh, you're from Aliahan, right? I knew as soon as I saw your clothes. They're so...plain.
*: Did you really give up the throne?
*: Did you really give up the throne?
*: Oh, but you were the perfect <IfGender_HERO(king,queen,)>!
*: Ah, I get it: you're going on a quest to keep your skills sharp.

TXT_Talk_Romaria_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0610_02.Text: *: Hurray! Hurray! Long live the new king!
*: Hurray! Hurray! Long live the new queen!

TXT_Talk_Romaria_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0710_01.Text: *: Pyufff... PYUUUfff! Uffa, is no good! I am a whistler terribile!
*: EH, BERTO! Dove sei, ah? Where are you? I go now to home! I leave you! How you like that, ah?
*: Caspita! I can whistle at last! PYUUU! PYUUU!
*: ...But still nothing. Perhaps Berto, he will never come home... (sigh)

TXT_Talk_Romaria_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0710_02.Text: *: Che onore! It is il Re himself! But Majesty, you look so much younger than before!
*: Ha ha! I joke! But it is a great thing that you are now king. Our land needs an injection of youthfulness. Buona fortuna!
*: With your beautiful person upon our throne, our country is surely destined for greatness! Viva la Regina!

TXT_Talk_Romaria_Out_SUB_0_VOLUME_0810_0.Text: *: Majesty! It is too dangerous for you to leave the town! We must ask that you remain within the town gates.
*: Majesty! It is too dangerous for you to leave the town! We must ask that you remain within the town gates.

TXT_Talk_Romaria_Out_SUB_0_VOLUME_0910_0.Text: *: Majesty! It is too dangerous for you to leave the town! We must ask that you remain within the town gates.
*: Majesty! It is too dangerous for you to leave the town! We must ask that you remain within the town gates.

TXT_Talk_Romaria_Out_SUB_0_VOLUME_1010_0.Text: *: Majesty! It is too dangerous for you to leave the town! We must ask that you remain within the town gates.
*: Majesty! It is too dangerous for you to leave the town! We must ask that you remain within the town gates.

TXT_Talk_Romaria_Out_SUB_0_VOLUME_1210_0.Text: *: I've heard from my merchant pals that monsters have been popping up inside towns of late. Scary stuff...
*: Honestly, all I want when I get into town is to relax and rid myself of all my aches and pains from the road. Can't do that if I'm sharing my bed with a bunicorn, can I?

TXT_Talk_Romaria_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_1210_02.Text: *: I've heard from my merchant pals that monsters have been popping up inside towns of late. Scary stuff...
*: Honestly, all I want when I get into town is to relax and rid myself of all my aches and pains from the road. Can't do that if I'm sharing my bed with a bunicorn, can I? Take care, Your Majesty.
*: Honestly, all I want when I get into town is to relax and rid myself of all my aches and pains from the road. Can't do that if I'm sharing my bed with a bunicorn, can I? Take care, Your Majesty.

TXT_Talk_Romaria_Out_SUB_0_VOLUME_1310_0.Text: *: A few nights ago, I saw a spiked hare by the fountain. It was standing completely still, so I tried to get closer to it, but it fled before you could say <6>scusi<9>!
*: Did you ever see that spiked hare by the fountain? I have not seen it lately... I do hope the little bunny is alright!

TXT_Talk_Romaria_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_1310_02.Text: *: Majesty, were you aware that at night a spiked hare appears by the town fountain?
*: It does not do any harm. If left alone, it stays there for a while grooming itself occasionally. But get too close and it flees right away!
*: That spiked hare that liked to visit the fountain at night has vanished recently. Do you know anything of this, Majesty?
*: Majesty, were you aware that at night a spiked hare appears by the town fountain?
*: It does not do any harm. If left alone, it stays there for a while grooming itself occasionally. But get too close and it flees right away!
*: That spiked hare that liked to visit the fountain at night has vanished recently. Do you know anything of this, Majesty?

TXT_Talk_Romaria_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_1410_01.Text: *: Majesty! It is too dangerous for you to leave the town! We must ask that you remain within the town gates.
*: Majesty! It is too dangerous for you to leave the town! We must ask that you remain within the town gates.

TXT_Talk_Romaria_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_1510_01.Text: *: Majesty! It is too dangerous for you to leave the town! We must ask that you remain within the town gates.
*: Majesty! It is too dangerous for you to leave the town! We must ask that you remain within the town gates.

TXT_Talk_Romaria_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_1610_01.Text: *: Majesty! It is too dangerous for you to leave the town! We must ask that you remain within the town gates.
*: Majesty! It is too dangerous for you to leave the town! We must ask that you remain within the town gates.

TXT_Talk_Romaria_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_1710_01.Text: *: Majesty! It is too dangerous for you to leave the town! We must ask that you remain within the town gates.
*: Majesty! It is too dangerous for you to leave the town! We must ask that you remain within the town gates.

TXT_Talk_Romaria_Inn_1F_SUB_0_ACTOR_0110.Text: *: Can the Archfiend truly be poised to take over our world? Surely such a thing could not happen.

TXT_Talk_Romaria_Inn_1F_SUB_0_ACTOR_0120.Text: *: Shh! Be quiet! You will wake my beautiful boy!

TXT_Talk_Romaria_Inn_1F_SUB_0_ACTOR_0110.Text: *: Oh, Your Majesty! You would speak with a humble traveller such as myself? Incredible! You are an inspiration to us all!
*: Oh, Your Majesty! You would speak with a humble traveller such as myself? Incredible! You are an inspiration to us all!

TXT_Talk_Romaria_Inn_1F_SUB_0_ACTOR_0210.Text: *: You are out for a stroll to benefit the royal health, sì, Majesty?
*: Very wise, Majesty, very wise. È una buona idea.
*: The weather, it is fine, and to stay cooped up inside the castle, this will do no good to any man.
*: You are out for a stroll to benefit the royal health, sì, Majesty?
*: Very wise, Majesty, very wise. È una buona idea.
*: The weather, it is fine, and to stay cooped up inside the castle, this will do no good to anyone.
*: Eh? You desire to stay in my humble inn? Ehehe! Majesty, surely you joke?
*: It is, of course, unthinkable for a royal personage to stay in such a...rustica lodging house as this. Ehehehe.
*: It is, of course, unthinkable for a royal personage to stay in such a...rustica lodging house as this. Ehehehe.
*: Che!? You truly wish to stay!? Santo cielo! V-Very well. Per favore, you must wait here...
*: I require un momento to prepare the suite upstairs for, ah...the royal visitation...
*: Haa... Haa... Th-The suite, Majesty... Haa... It awaits... Please, follow me!
*: Grazie mille for gracing our humble establishment with your royal presence, Majesty! Please, stay as long as you wish.

TXT_Talk_Romaria_Inn_1F_SUB_0_SCENE_0210.Text: *: Ay, it is twenty years now since first I opened my humble inn, and never have I felt so happy!
*: We are honoured! Honoured indeed! Grazie, Majesty! Grazie mille!

TXT_Talk_Romaria_Inn_1F_SUB_0_ACTOR_0210.Text: *: Ay, it is twenty years now since first I opened my humble inn, and never have I felt so happy!
*: We are honoured! Honoured indeed! Grazie, Majesty! Grazie mille!
*: King {HERO}! Beloved Majesty! Benvenuto! A thousand times, welcome!
*: Thanks to your patronage, the business of my humble inn, it booms!
*: Queen {HERO}! Beloved Majesty! Benvenuta! A thousand times, welcome!
*: Thanks to your patronage, the business of my humble inn, it booms!
<Cap><DefSgl_LEADER> reads the sign on the wall.
<6>Welcome to Hotel Royal Romarian, resting place of monarchs since time immemorial!<9>

TXT_Talk_Romaria_Inn_1F_SUB_0_ACTOR_0320.Text: *: Mmm... Zzz... Don't worry, Mum! I will protect you from the Archfiend! Hyah! Zzz...

TXT_Talk_Romaria_Inn_2F_SUB_0_ACTOR_0120.Text: *: Archfiend? Bah, he is no more than a rumour. A tale told to scare the little bambini.

TXT_Talk_Romaria_Inn_2F_KingEvent_SUB_0_.Text: *: This way, Majesty, this way. Please, stay as long as you wish. It is a great onore to have you with us.
A thick, soft, brand-new-looking eiderdown is draped luxuriously across the bed. Take a nap?

TXT_Talk_Romaria_Shop_SUB_0_ACTOR_0110_0.Text: *: Perhaps it is because of the terribile minaccia<--->the, ah, how you say...menace<--->of the Archfiend, but...
*: ...The people, they seem so...so down in these days, you know?
*: Y-Y-Your Majesty! Good day! I pray that you are healthy and well. Viva il Re!
*: Ah, by the way...the previous king, he went down the stairs here not so long ago...
*: Y-Y-Your Majesty! Good day! I pray that you are healthy and well. Viva la Regina!
*: Ah, by the way...the former king, he went down the stairs here not so long ago...

TXT_Talk_Romaria_Shop_SUB_0_ACTOR_0210_0.Text: *: You are our new king, sì? Then please, I beg of you<--->you must lower the taxes!
*: You are our new queen, sì? Then please, I beg of you<--->you must lower the taxes!

TXT_Talk_Romaria_Shop_SUB_0_ACTOR_0310_0.Text: *: You could've knocked me down with a feather! I look round, and the king is standing right there! Talk about a surprise!
*: Uhh, anyway, thank you very much, Your Majesty. We do great business here, and we hope to continue.
*: You could've knocked me down with a feather! I look round, and the queen is standing right there! Talk about a surprise!
*: Uhh, anyway, thank you very much, Your Majesty. We do great business here, and we hope to continue.

TXT_Talk_Romaria_Shop_SUB_0_ACTOR_0410_0.Text: *: It is vitale you remain cautious when visiting the northern mountains. There are monsters up there who can paralyse men!
*: And if you are paralysed in battle, then you cannot act. And if you cannot act, you may meet an end most orribile...
*: This is why you must be most careful, sì? It would be wise for you to keep many moonwort bulbs on your person if you go that way.

TXT_Talk_Romaria_Shop_SUB_0_ACTOR_0510_0.Text: *: People's eyes are always drawn to weapons and shields, but I say it is most stupido to forget about accessories.
*: They can bestow molti useful effects and let you boost your agility and wisdom, which weapons and defensive gear cannot.

TXT_Talk_Romaria_House_SUB_0_ACTOR_0110_.Text: *: Omè, but the world, it is become so dangerous!
*: We must trust il Re, our beloved king, to guide us through these times difficili.
*: Mah, che vergogna! What a shame! What a great, great shame... I had hoped that you would make our country great again!
*: If the former king who is now king again does not reform his ways, it will be for all of us a disastro... (mutter grumble)
*: Mamma mia! The king himself has come to see an old nonna such as me! Grazie, Majesty! Grazie mille!
*: Mamma mia! The queen herself has come to see an old nonna such as me! Grazie, Majesty! Grazie mille!
*: Kind Majesty... I wonder if you might, for an old woman nearing the end of her days, perform a small favour?
*: Kind Majesty... I wonder if you might, for an old woman nearing the end of her days, perform a small favour?
*: Grazie. You see, it is the signore to whom is charged the care of the castle flower-beds. He shirks his duty!
*: The gardens, they are a remembrance to our former queen consort, rest her soul.
*: To let them go to seed would be to insult her memory gravely. Per favore, you must tell him<--->no, order him<--->the flower-beds, they must be weeded!
*: Grazie. You see, it is the signore to whom is charged the care of the castle flower-beds. He shirks his duty!
*: The gardens, they are a remembrance to our former queen consort, rest her soul.
*: To let them go to seed would be to insult her memory gravely. Per favore, you must tell him<--->no, order him<--->the flower-beds, they must be weeded!
*: Che? Forgive me, Majesty. I think my aged ears, they must be deceiving me...
*: Grazie. You see, it is the signore to whom is charged the care of the castle flower-beds. He shirks his duty!
*: The gardens, they are a remembrance to our former queen consort, rest her soul.
*: To let them go to seed would be to insult her memory gravely. Per favore, you must tell him<--->no, order him<--->the flower-beds, they must be weeded!
*: To let them go to seed would be to insult her memory gravely. Per favore, you must tell him<--->no, order him<--->the flower-beds, they must be weeded!
*: Mamma mia! The king himself has come to see an old nonna such as me! Grazie, Majesty! Grazie mille!
*: Mamma mia! The queen herself has come to see an old nonna such as me! Grazie, Majesty! Grazie mille!

TXT_Talk_Romaria_Church_SUB_0_ACTOR_0110.Text: *: Many leagues to the north there lies the village of Khoryv. It is most beautiful, but it is quite the walk to get there...
*: What in heaven is having happened to my village of Norvik, hm?
*: Please, brave hero, you must be going to save my people right away!
*: I am having received a letter from my relatives back in Norvik.
*: Though I am not having been back in years, it is saying, <6>How great it was to see you the other day!<9>
*: Whatever can have happened? I do not understand it even in the slightest part...
*: Majesty! Kind Majesty! I beg of you to please be saving the village of Norvik from its terrible fate!
*: Hm? You say that the curse is having already been lifted? Goodness! You are a great monarch indeed!
*: I am not having heard from my relatives back in Norvik for many years now.
*: I cannot help but think that something terrible is having happened...
*: Majesty! Kind Majesty! I beg of you to please be saving the village of Norvik from its terrible fate!
*: Hm? You say that the curse is already having been lifted? Goodness! You are a great monarch indeed!
*: I am not having heard from my relatives back in Norvik for many years now.
*: I cannot help but think that something terrible is having happened...

TXT_Talk_Romaria_Church_SUB_0_ACTOR_0210.Text: *: Well, if it is not the new monarch of our fair land!
*: Almighty Goddess, we pray that You give this humble servant of Yours the strength and wisdom to be a fair and just king...
*: Well, if it is not the new monarch of our fair land!
*: Almighty Goddess, we pray that You give this humble servant of Yours the strength and wisdom to be a fair and just queen...

TXT_Talk_Romaria_BattleRoad_SUB_0_ACTOR_.Text: *: This is a place of monster combattimento<--->the monster arena! Can you smell it? The PASSION? Ah, magnifico!
*: M-Majesty! Che diavolo fai!? Whatever are you doing in a place such as this!?
*: M-Majesty! Che diavolo fai!? Whatever are you doing in a place such as this!?
*: Eh, you are not from around here, ah, darling? I hope you have a wonderful time in our beautiful city of Romaria! Do enjoy the monster arena as well!
*: Ciao, signore! Ay, what an...extravagant outfit you are wearing! Molto elegante! I love it! Hee hee!
*: Ciao, signora! My, you appear to be very wealthy indeed! Per favore, feel free to spend as much money as you please!
*: If you wish to take part in a torneo<--->scusi, a tournament<--->you must go to the counter and pay your entry fee, sì?
*: Eek! L-Long live our new king! Viva il Re!
*: Eek! B-B<---> Queen {HERO}! I... Ahh... L-Long live the queen! Viva la Regina! Ehehehe...
*: Basta! Vada via, ah? Leave me alone! I must not be distracted!
*: But Your Majesty, whatever are you doing in this place? It is so...so very beneath your station! Mhmhmhm!
*: ...Hm? Me? Why, I have merely come to see how the other half live, of course. As, I'm sure, have you! Mhmm! Mhmhmhmhmhm!
*: But Your Majesty, whatever are you doing in this place? It is so...so very beneath your station! Mhmhmhm!
*: ...Hm? Me? Why, I have merely come to see how the other half live, of course. As, I'm sure, have you! Mhmm! Mhmhmhmhmhm!
*: The higher the rank of the torneo, the more spells and abilities will be used by your opponents. The experience will be molto bene for you and your monsters!
*: Now, remember: killerpillars use Kabuff frequentemente! If you cannot beat one, use a monster that knows many incantesimi<--->many spells!
*: (mutter mumble)
*: (mutter mumble)
*: Caspita, this is incredibile! My monster preferito can't stop winning!
*: Insect-family monsters are to be feared, sì? Unless you can use ice spells<--->then, vittoria is yours!
*: Morphean mushrooms are most potente. Watch out for their Sweet Breath and Dazzle spells!
*: I understand completely, Majesty. You do not need to explain your presence here to me. You are human, after all.
*: Who has time to work when monsters are fighting? Not I! Ehehehehe.
*: We are but men, sì?
*: Do not worry, I will not tell a soul of your being here. Not a soul. Ehehehehe.
*: I understand completely, Majesty. You do not need to explain your presence here to me. You are human, after all.
*: Who has time to work when monsters are fighting? Not I! Ehehehehe.
*: I swear not to tell anyone I saw such a fair maiden as you here.
*: Do not worry, I will not tell a soul of your being here. Not a soul. Ehehehehe.
*: Wahey, fings are about to get started!
*: Wassat, Yer 'Ighness? Come to watch the monsters fight it out, eh? Me too<--->there ain't a finer sport out there!
*: Tsk. Luck's not on me bleedin' side today...
*: Those bleedin' monsters wot can use Sweet Breath do me 'ead in.
*: It's th-the king!!! Ulp!
*: It's th-the queen!!! Ulp!
*: Ho ho ho ho! Well met, friend! It is I, the former king!
*: And may I say that being a commoner is more fun than I had ever imagined! Have you tried your hand at these monster fights? It is most amusing!
*: Ah, but do not let our kingdom fall into ruins, now! How goes the governing, anyway? Is the throne to your liking?
*: I hope that our paths will cross again soon. Until then, have fun! Ho ho ho!
*: ...Hm? You say that you are not enjoying the life of a king? That you wish to relinquish your title?
*: Che? You no longer wish to be queen of this fair land? Truly?
*: You truly mean it, ah? Well, I cannot in good conscience allow you to continue if it does not make you happy.
*: It was brief, but a small break from kingship was just what the doctor ordered.
*: Very well, {HERO}. It is time for you to return to your quest.
*: Thank the heavens for that! You had me worried for a moment there!
*: I hope that our paths will cross again soon. Until then, have fun! Ho ho ho!

TXT_Talk_Romaria_Castle_1F_SUB_0_ACTOR_0.Text: *: Ciao, friend! You are our visitor from Aliahan, sì? Perfetto! We have been awaiting you!
*: Your Former Majesty! Good day! I trust that you are healthy and well?
*: Your Former Majesty! Good day! I trust that you are healthy and well?
*: Ciao, friend! You are our visitor from Aliahan, sì? Perfetto! The hour grows late, but we have been awaiting you!
*: Buonasera, traveller of Aliahan! You are setting out again on your journey? Be sure to stay sicuro on the road!
*: All hail il Re! King...ah...? Your Majesty!
*: You are the sun, the moon, the ground beneath our humble shoes. Viva il Re!
*: All hail Her Majesty! Viva la Regina!
*: You are the sun, the moon, the ground beneath our humble shoes. Viva la Regina!
*: Il Re, the king, he waits for you. Go to him. Avanti!
*: Il Re, he is up the stairs here.
*: Friend, find a room at the inn, and come back tomorrow. A domani.
*: I have heard the news. You are our new king<--->{HERO}, sì?
*: Then, by order of the royal guard, I must ask that you do not leave the town, Majesty. This I do for your protezione.
*: I have heard the news. You are our new queen<--->{HERO}, sì?
*: Then, by order of the royal guard, I must ask that you do not leave the town, Majesty. This I do for your protezione.
*: Are you ever troubled by paralysis, friend? Time heals all<--->paralysis included<--->but if you wish it to be cured immediatamente, you must use a moonwort bulb!
*: Friend, are you aware of the great properties of the wizard's staff? It can assault enemies with great balls of fire!
*: And its use is not limited by any power of heaven or earth. Molto utile, ah? Very useful. Very useful indeed!
*: Are you aware of the great properties of the wizard's staff, Majesty? It can assault enemies with great balls of fire!
*: And its use is not limited by any power of heaven or earth. Molto utile, ah? Very useful. Very useful indeed!
*: Are you aware of the great properties of the wizard's staff, Majesty? It can assault enemies with great balls of fire!
*: And its use is not limited by any power of heaven or earth. Molto utile, ah? Very useful. Very useful indeed!
*: Are you aware of the great properties of the wizard's staff, Majesty? It can assault enemies with great balls of fire!
*: And its use is not limited by any power of heaven or earth. Molto utile, ah? Very useful. Very useful indeed!
*: Was there something you wished to talk with me about, Majesty?
*: Are you aware of the great properties of the wizard's staff, Majesty? It can assault enemies with great balls of fire!
*: And its use is not limited by any power of heaven or earth. Molto utile, ah? Very useful. Very useful indeed!
*: Was there something you wished to talk with me about, Majesty?
*: Che? The weeding of the flower-beds? F-Forgive me, Majesty. I have indeed been lax in this respect.
*: But now that you speak to me of it in person, I see it is a matter of great importance.
*: But now that you speak to me of it in person, I see it is a matter of great importance.
*: To tell the truth, I... I had thought nobody cared for my work, and had begun to dream of becoming a mage or soldier.
*: But now I see that it is not so. Grazie, Majesty! I shall weed the flower-beds until not a stray blade of grass remains!
*: Va bene. Forgive me.
*: To tell the truth, I... I had thought nobody cared for my work, and had begun to dream of becoming a mage or soldier.
*: But now I see that it is not so. Grazie, Majesty! I shall weed the flower-beds until not a stray blade of grass remains!
*: Ah, by the way...
*: Are you aware of the great properties of the wizard's staff, Majesty? It can assault enemies with great balls of fire!
*: And its use is not limited by any power of heaven or earth. Molto utile, ah? Very useful. Very useful indeed!
*: Are you aware of the great properties of the wizard's staff, Majesty? It can assault enemies with great balls of fire!
*: And its use is not limited by any power of heaven or earth. Molto utile, ah? Very useful. Very useful indeed!
*: Majesty! King {HERO}! Behold, the flower-beds! They have been made beautiful indeed, no?
*: Ah, by the way...
*: Are you aware of the great properties of the wizard's staff, Majesty? It can assault enemies with great balls of fire!
*: And its use is not limited by any power of heaven or earth. Molto utile, ah? Very useful. Very useful indeed!
*: Majesty! Queen {HERO}! Behold, the flower-beds! They have been made beautiful indeed, no?
*: Ah, by the way...
*: Are you aware of the great properties of the wizard's staff, Majesty? It can assault enemies with great balls of fire!
*: And its use is not limited by any power of heaven or earth. Molto utile, ah? Very useful. Very useful indeed!

*: Cazzarola... The monsters, they have become so numerous of late...
It is a worry, no?
*: It is true that you abdicate the throne, sì? Such a waste. Why did you not pass it to one who deserved it? One such as me...
*: It is true that you abdicate the throne, sì? Such a waste. Why did you not pass it to one who deserved it? One such as me...
*: The checkpoint in the north-west, it is guarded by men such as myself. No monster dares to trespass! I hope...
*: Il Re, the king, he has retired to his bed.
*: Cazzarola... If only it had been I who defeated Robbin' 'Ood, then perhaps instead now I would be king...
*: Eek! Majesty! Forgive my foolish mutterings! Ah... Viva il Re!
*: Cazzarola... Not only am I hounded by the wife in my home, now I am to be ruled by a woman in my place of work... Uffa! I may actually have to do my job!
*: Eek! M-Majesty! Forgive my foolish mutterings! Ah... Viva la Regina!
*: To the east are beasts of great violenza.
*: You should travel first north, and hone your skills there.
*: Ay, I had wished to train in the sword with you, friend, but it seems now you will leave us. Such a shame...
*: If you see your friend, the hero of all heroes, please, send a message from me.
*: Per favore, return to us and be our king once more! You will send the message, sì?
*: If you see your friend, the hero of all heroes, please, send a message from me.
*: Per favore, return to us and be our queen once more! You will send the message, sì?
*: I have heard the tale of how the mighty {HERO} bested wicked Robbin' 'Ood, and returned the crown of our kingdom.
*: You are indeed worthy of ruling us, Your Majesty. Viva il Re!
*: I have heard the tale of how the mighty {HERO} bested wicked Robbin' 'Ood, and returned the crown of our kingdom.
*: You are indeed worthy of ruling us, Your Majesty. Viva la Regina!
*: I travel to here from village of Khoryv in north. But monsters aggress me, and I run, leaving stocks behind.
*: Now, I am without goods, and incapable of profiting even minimally. Yoy... Such luck... (sob)
*: Yoy! So you no longer make to look as if royal king or some such?
*: Yoy! So you no longer make to look as if royal queen or some such?
*: This is good. Present appearance fits you more snugly.
*: I travel to here from village of Khoryv in north. But monsters aggress me, and I run, leaving stocks behind.
*: Now, I am without goods, and incapable of profiting even minimally. Yoy... Such luck... (sob)
*: Yoy! {HERO}, can it indeed be you? You have become pre-eminent!
*: Ha! You seem almost as if king of this country! Hahaha!
*: Yoy! {HERO}, can it indeed be you? You have become pre-eminent!
*: Ha! You seem almost as if queen of this country! Hahaha!
*: Portoga, far to the west of here, is a great home of boatbuilding.
*: Ahh, to have a boat... With a barca all your own, you could sail to the ends of the oceans...
*: Ahh, to gaze at the stars, it fills the soul with tranquillità, no? Ah, by the way...
*: Portoga, far to the west of here, is a great home of boatbuilding.
*: Ahh, to have a boat... With a barca all your own, you could sail to the ends of the oceans...
*: What is this? Who presumes to impersonate il Re? You will not fool me, foul criminale!
*: ...Che? The king has given up his crown to you? I, I... Mille scuse! A thousand apologies for my impudenza!
*: Let me pay for my insult, with the gift of knowledge, Majesty. Far to the west lies the shipbuilding city of Portoga.
*: Would it not be magnifico to climb aboard a great barca and sail the seas, just once, ah?
*: Uh!? Did you call me <6>servitore<9>? Who died and made you queen, ah?
*: ...Che? Il Re has given up his crown to you? I, I... Mille scuse! A thousand apologies for my impudenza!
*: Let me pay for my insult, with the gift of knowledge, Majesty. Far to the west lies the shipbuilding city of Portoga.
*: Would it not be magnifico to climb aboard a great barca and sail the seas, just once, ah?
*: I've heard that there are fantastico people in this world who can get close enough to wild monsters to befriend them! Every time I go near one they just run off...
*: Honestly, I've wanted to pet a soft little bunicorn ever since I was a bambino.
*: You know, not all wild monsters are aggressivi towards humans. I hear that they will allow some people even to touch them!
*: Honestly, I've wanted to pet a soft little bunicorn ever since I was a bambino... O-O-Oh my, you are the king! Mi dispiace! I am sorry!
*: Honestly, I've wanted to pet a soft little bunicorn ever since I was a bambino... O-O-Oh my, you are the queen! Mi dispiace! I am sorry!

TXT_Talk_Romaria_Castle_2F_SUB_0_ACTOR_0.Text: *: You are our visitor from Aliahan, sì? Welcome, welcome!
*: We pray for your luck in the battles to come, friend! Buona fortuna!
*: All hail His Majesty! Viva il Re!
*: All hail Her Majesty! Viva la Regina!
*: I hear the songs of the wind, friend. Would you hear them too?

*: ♪ Ohhh, far, far to the south-west of Khoryv in the north...
Standeth stark Skyfell Tow'r which doth our castle dwarrrf!
Tan-taran-tan-taran-taaa! ♪

*: ♪ Oh, a person who taketh not song in his heart...
Is a stranger to joy, and a hater of aaart!
Tin-taran-ton-taran-tooo! ♪
*: I still hear the songs of the wind, friend. Would you hear them too?

*: ♪ Ohhh, peace hath returned unto old Skyfell Towerrr...
And all thanks to thee, friend, hero of the hourrr!
Tan-taran-tan-taran-taaa! ♪

*: ♪ Oh, a person who taketh not song in his heart...
Is a stranger to joy, and a hater of aaart!
Tin-taran-ton-taran-tooo! ♪

*: ♪ Ohhh, to speak to one's king is an honour indeeed...
May our worship His Majesty's wishes exceeed!
Fol-de-ree, dol-de-ree... (simper) ♪
*: ♪ Ohhh, Romaria town is a city most fair... ♪

*: ♪ With a queen of a beauty that's beyond compaaare! O, wonderful, magical, beautiful Queeen...
Sent by the Goddess to rule us, sereeene! Hoy-deral-doy-deral-deee! ♪ (simper)
Please, do as His Majesty asks, friend.
Just between ourselves, I, too, have served as sovereign. Five times, in fact.
Should you ever wish to experience royal life again, I am sure His Majesty would be more than willing to accommodate you.
Tell me, {LEADER}, have you ever traversed the desert south of Romaria? Believe it or not, there is a kingdom down that way.
I have heard tales of all manner of treasures said to slumber in the region. Perhaps there is something there that could aid you on your adventure, sì?

Though, you must steel yourself before exploring the area. It is populated with monsters much more fearsome than those around here. But if the stories of treasure are true, it is a journey worth the risk.
To get there, you must first travel east of Romaria, then circle around southwards. You will know you are in the right place when all you can see is miles and miles of desert.
The kingdom of Ibis itself features in many of the realm's myths and legends; I have no doubt you will learn something of use should you pay it a visit.
Tell me, {LEADER}, have you been to the kingdom of Portoga yet? You can reach it if you head westwards via the outpost to the north.
Its ruler is a little on the...bizarre side, but he commands a great fleet of trading vessels. As such, I am sure he knows many an interesting rumour.
His Majesty might be able to share some with you, should you gain an audience with him.
My courtiers tell me that Aliahan is a place of great beauty.
Tell me, is there beauty in the hearts of its people too? Spero di sì... I hope it is so...
(sigh) And I had so wished to see how our dear country might blossom under a young king such as yourself...
(sigh) And I had so wished to see how our dear country might blossom under a young queen such as yourself...
But it cannot be helped. Cosi va il mondo<--->such is life. You must do what you must do.
(sigh) I had so wished that a new ruler might bring glory to our realm...
Ahh well, cosi va il mondo<--->such is life...
Caspita! Why, King {HERO}!
You look every inch the royal personage! We must find you a princess to marry!
Caspita! Why, Queen {HERO}!
My husband, the previous king, he was a good leader...
But he does not notice the small things...the details, sì? I look forward to a truly enlightened reign.

TXT_Talk_Romaria_Castle_2F_SUB_0_SCENE_0.Text: Well met, traveller! Tell me, what brings you to fairest Roma<--->
Ah, I see. You must be the hero of Aliahan. Your king sent word that you were on a mission of great importance.
It is an honour to at last meet the scion of Ortega in the flesh. Your reputation precedes you!
Now, there is something I must ask of you.
That despicable brigand Robbin' 'Ood has stolen from us our most sacred and regal crown.
Were you able to return it to us, you would prove yourself a true hero.
Believe me, you will not get a better chance to show just what a descendant of the great Ortega can do!
Go forth, and may luck travel with you!

TXT_Talk_Romaria_Castle_2F_SUB_0_ACTOR_0.Text: That despicable brigand Robbin' 'Ood has stolen from us our most sacred and regal crown.
Were you able to return it to us, you would prove yourself a true hero.
Go forth, and may luck travel with you!
Were you able to return it to us, you would prove yourselves a company of true heroes.
Go forth, {LEADER}, and may luck travel with you!
My apologies, but I cannot permit you to pass through the outpost until my crown has been retrieved. You understand, sì?
It is just as I thought: the villain Robbin' 'Ood is hiding in Skyfell Tower to the west of Khoryv.
You must relinquish him of my crown, please!

TXT_Talk_Romaria_Castle_2F_SUB_0_SCENE_0.Text: Can it really be true? Have you brought our crown back to us?
You are a hero indeed. Worthy of a realm of your own to rule. Deserving of a crown.
Will you take the crown of our dear country in my stead? It weighs so heavily upon my brow...
Assent, and I will abdicate immediately in your favour! So? Will you accept the priceless gift I offer?
Excellent! Then it is decided. Long live the new Regent of Romaria!
You will do it? You will become king in my place? Very well! All hail the new king of...
But what am I saying? You are a lady! A lady cannot become king!
But queen, on the other hand... You would be the first in Romarian history... And there must always be a first, no?
Woman or not, it was you who defeated Robbin' 'Ood<--->a victory worthy of a mighty monarch.
Very well. It shall be so. A queen is born! Long live the queen! Viva la Regina!
Hmm, you do not like the idea, perhaps? But how will you know unless you try it?
It will be no good you changing your mind later on<--->this is the only chance you will ever have to live the life of a royal.
You are stubborn, I see.
But not one bit as stubborn as I!
Again you decline? What is the meaning of such reticence?
But the faith you display in your own mind shows only how suited you are to rule...
Hm!? Again!?
If you continue to refuse, my supply of blandishments will be exhausted...
Grr...
So be it. If the gift of a kingdom is so much to your disliking, I will not abase myself further. Do as you wish!
Can it really be true? Have you brought our crown back to us?
The company of the scion of Ortega is truly a mighty one!
I do not see {HERO} among you.
Would you be so kind as to bring <IfGender_HERO(him,her,)> before me? I would ask a boon of <IfGender_HERO(him,her,)>...
Go forth, and may luck travel with you!
I must thank you for acquiescing to the king's, er...eccentric demands.
However, I am well aware that you are on an important mission of your own.
Should you find yourself needing to return to your travels, visit the monster arena<--->that is where you will find the former king.
You see, the king has shirked his duties to go and watch the monsters more times than I can count. I am certain he is in the arena.

TXT_Talk_Romaria_Castle_2F_SUB_0_ACTOR_0.Text: And I had so wished to hand my crown and kingdom to you, {HERO}...
Will you take the crown of our dear country in my stead? It weighs so heavily upon my brow...
Assent, and I will abdicate immediately in your favour! So? Will you accept the priceless gift I offer?
Excellent! Then it is decided. Long live the new Regent of Romaria!
You will do it? You will become king in my place? Very well! All hail the new king of...
But what am I saying? You are a lady! A lady cannot become king!
But queen, on the other hand... You would be the first in Romarian history... And there must always be a first, no?
Woman or not, it was you who defeated Robbin' 'Ood<--->a victory worthy of a mighty monarch.
Very well. It shall be so. A queen is born! Long live the queen! Viva la Regina!
Hmm... Very well. Go forth, and may luck travel with you.
Go forth, and may luck travel with you.
Hmm... I did not witness it myself, but it seems you were quite the well-loved ruler, {HERO}.
It is a shame that you relinquished your crown so soon, but I hope that the experience was a valuable one.
I expect great things from you in the future. Do not disappoint me. Now, go forth to adventure!
Hmm... I did not witness it myself, but it seems you were quite the well-loved ruler, {HERO}.
It is a shame that you relinquished your crown so soon, but I hope that the experience was a valuable one.
I expect great things from you in the future. Do not disappoint me. Now, go forth to adventure!
(sigh) And I had so wished to hand the crown that weighs so heavy on my brow to you, {HERO}...
...You feel at home here in Romaria, yes? A thought occurs to me... How would you like to rule in my stead? Would this please you?
Excellent! Then it is decided. Long live the new Regent of Romaria!
Excellent! Then it is decided. Long live the new Regent of Romaria!
Hmm... Very well. I suppose I cannot force the crown upon your head...
Go forth, and may luck travel with you.
(sigh) And I had so wished to hand the crown that weighs so heavy on my brow to {HERO}...

TXT_Talk_Romaria_Castle_4F_B_SUB_0_ACTOR.Text: *: Leave it out, will ya? 'Ow many times do I 'ave to tell ya? I don't know no Robbin' 'Ood. I've never even 'eard of the bloke!
*: Eh? 'Oo the 'eck are you? I thought you was anuvver one of them guards come to give me a grillin'.
*: If they've got it in this bad for me, 'oo knows what they'll do to old Robbin' if they catch 'im...
*: Wassat? Where is 'e? Up Skyfell Tower, I 'eard. 'Im an' 'is gang of 'orrible 'enchmen. Give 'em an 'idin' from me, will ya?
*: Robbin' 'Ood ain't no ordinary crook, y'know. 'E's a slippery one, an' no mistake.
*: E'll be back wiv some scam or other before long, you mark my words...
*: Didn't you let Robbin' 'Ood escape? I mean, no offence<--->but wot the 'eck are they playin' at, 'andin' a soft touch like you the reins?
*: Wassat? They've gone an' made you queen o' Romaria, 'ave they? A girl? Runnin' a country? Cor blimey! We're livin' in the future now!
*: 'Ang on, though<--->didn't you let Robbin' 'Ood escape? Wot kind of loonies are they, 'andin' a soft touch like you the reins?

TXT_Talk_Romaria_Castle_4F_A_SUB_0_ACTOR.Text: *: Ohibò... Dear me... My son, the king, he loves to make merry above all else... He prefers to play than to rule...
*: Mah, it was better that you remained our king than that idiota boy of mine took the throne again... (grumble grumble)
*: Mah, it was better that you remained our queen than that idiota boy of mine took the throne again... (grumble grumble)
*: Mah, porca miseria... He is of good, noble blood... Why he cannot learn to rule, ah...? (grumble grumble)
*: To be king is not something that just anyone can do. It is an art... A gift... Sì...
*: But he simply does not understand... Idiota... (grumble grumble)
*: Ah? He made you king in his place?
*: So still he cannot mend his foolish ways, ah? Porca miseria! (grumble grumble)
*: Ah? He made you queen in his place?
*: So still he cannot mend his foolish ways, ah? Porca miseria! (grumble grumble)

TXT_Talk_Romaria_BattleRoad_Info_SUB_0_A.Text: *: Your Majesty! What honour, what privilege that you would spectate today. Please, this way<--->the best seat in the house awaits!
*: Your Majesty! What honour, what privilege that you would spectate today. Please, this way<--->the best seat in the house awaits!

TXT_Talk_Romaria_BattleRoad_Entry_SUB_0_.Text: *: Oh, Your Majesty! Um... Are you here to take part in a tournament?
*: I'm terribly sorry about this, but I cannot allow the king to partake in our commoner pastimes. Please, abdicate the throne first.
*: Oh, Your Majesty! Um... Are you here to take part in a tournament?
*: I'm terribly sorry about this, but I cannot allow the queen to partake in our commoner pastimes. Please, abdicate the throne first.

TXT_Talk_Romaria_BattleRoad_Zoo_SUB_0_AC.Text: Ah, good to see y<---> What in the Goddess's name are you wearing?
...Eh? You're king here now? Well, if that's the case, I imagine you've got all sorts of royal duties to be attending to. You mustn't be seen mucking about in the monster arena!
Ah, good to see y<---> What in the Goddess's name are you wearing?
...Eh? You're queen here now? Well, if that's the case, I imagine you've got all sorts of royal duties to be attending to. You mustn't be seen mucking about in the monster arena!

TXT_Talk_Romaria_BattleRoad_Bank_SUB_0_A.Text: *: Your Majesty... Please, forgive my dissent, but this is no place for a king. Might I suggest you leave before someone sees you here?
*: Your Majesty... Please, forgive my dissent, but this is no place for a queen. Might I suggest you leave before someone sees you here?

TXT_Talk_Romaria_BattleRoad_Nun_SUB_0_AC.Text: *: Oh my! Your Majesty! You honour us with your presence.
*: I shall pray to the Goddess to bless your reign, that it may be long and bestow great bounties upon your loyal subjects.
*: Oh my! Your Majesty! You honour us with your presence.
*: I shall pray to the Goddess to bless your reign, that it may be long and bestow great bounties upon your loyal subjects.

TXT_Talk_Romaria_BattleRoad_Arena_SUB_0_.Text: *: Benvenuti! Welcome one and all to the rank-1 tournament!
*: Benvenuti! Welcome one and all to the rank-2 tournament!
*: Today we receive a new challenger<--->the team of {LEADER}!
*: I must now ask all spectators to give their applauso for our competitors today!
*: Now is the time to begin match numero 1 of the tournament! Combattenti, please step forward!
*: Now is the time to begin match numero 1 of the tournament! Combattenti, please step forward!
*: On your marks, get set, fight!
*: You are the rookie wrangler that Monty spoke of, sì?
*: Your monsters, they seem very lively. Bene, bene! We will have a good match, I think!
*: Hmm... So this is the newcomer with the bright future...
*: Vittoria! We have a winner in match numero {VALUE}!
*: Now we will continue on to match numero {VALUE}. Combattenti, step forward!
*: The next match will be the final bout in this tournament!
*: We hope that both teams will give their very best and will make a good contest...
*: Combattenti, please step forward!
*: Is time for the deciding match in rank 1!
*: On your marks, get set, fight!
*: Santo cielo! Good heavens, the challenger lost!
*: The team of {LEADER} is knocked out in match numero {VALUE} and fails to win the rank-1 tournament!
*: Finito! We have a winner in the rank-1 tournament, here at the monster arena! It is a magnificent victory for the challenger!
*: As we all know, winners in rank 1 earn the right to fight in rank 2 next.
*: Finalmente, I must ask all the audience to give a round of applause to our combattenti! They did well, sì?
*: That concludes today's tournament in the monster arena! Join us again next time for more fighting action!
*: Vittoria! We have a winner in match numero {VALUE}!
*: Now we will continue on to match numero {VALUE}. Combattenti, step forward!
*: The next match will be the final bout in this tournament!
*: We hope that both teams will give their very best and will make a good contest...
*: Combattenti, please step forward!
*: Is time for the deciding match in rank 2!
*: On your marks, get set, fight!
*: Santo cielo! Good heavens, the challenger lost!
*: The team of {LEADER} is knocked out in match numero {VALUE} and fails to win the rank-2 tournament!
*: Finito! We have a winner in the rank-2 tournament, here at the monster arena! It is a magnificent victory for the challenger!
*: As we all know, winners in rank 2 earn the right to fight in rank 3 next.
*: Finalmente, I must ask all the audience to give a round of applause to our combattenti! They did well, sì?
*: That concludes today's tournament in the monster arena! Join us again next time for more fighting action!
I did not expect to encounter you here, but then I am sure you would say the same of me, sì? May the best team win<--->combattiamo!
Magnifico! You have truly earned the title of victor, {LEADER}! Your management of your team was autoritario<--->absolutely masterful.
Ma che tristezza<--->my sympathies. Though, do not be too disheartened. You did your best, and will surely come back stronger one day.

TXT_Talk_Romaria_Out_SUB_0_VOLUME_1130_0.Text: {LEADER} calms the monster with a soothing voice and tells it about Monty's monster menagerie...
